item.title: Continuously deliver static sites with Hugo, CircleCI and GitHub Pages
item.description: In this tutorial you will learn how to use Hugo and CircleCI to continuously deliver a static site to GitHub Pages. Prerequisites A Github account GitHub Pages Create a GitHub Pages repository and clone it - the name of the respository must be <username>.github.io: git clone git@github.com:<username>/<username>.github.io.git Hello Hugo Follow the official Hugo Quick Start guide to setup Hugo on your machine and create some content inside the newly created repository.
